naslov: MEDITERANSKA VILA / POGLED / Vinišće, uvala Ljubljeva /VIDEO -čitaj op (prodaja)
opis: Na prodaju je predivna mediteranska vila smještena u mirnom predjelu uvale Ljubljeva, Vinišće, svega dvjestotinjak metara od mora. Vila pruža potpunu privatnost i mir, zahvaljujući poziciji u slijepoj ulici, te očarava panoramskim pogledom na more i obližnje otoke. Okružena je bogatim održavanim mediteranskim raslinjem koje dodatno naglašava autentični dalmatinski ambijent. Osnovne karakteristike: • Površina zemljišta: 615 m² • Stambena površina: 254 m² • Godina izgradnje: oko 2010.godine • Održavana i renovirana – veći dio namještaja i opreme ugrađen prije nekoliko godina • Bazen: 24 m² • Privatni parking za 4 vozila Raspored prostorija: Vila se sastoji od tri etaže: prizemlja, srednje etaže i gornje etaže. • Prizemlje: Tri prostrane spavaće sobe, dvije kupaonice, hodnik te izlaz na terasu i bazen od 24 m². U dvorištu se nalazi njegovan vrt s mediteranskim biljem, maslinama i drugim autohtonim kulturama. • Srednja etaža: Prostrana kuhinja povezana s blagovaonicom i dnevnim boravkom, dodatna kupaonica te izlaz na dvije manje terase (djelomično natkrivene) s prekrasnim pogledom na more. • Gornja etaža: Prostrana spavaća soba s otvorenom kupaonicom i dnevnim dijelom, koja može služiti kao zasebna stambena jedinica. Izlaz na veliku natkrivenu terasu s impresivnim panoramskim pogledom na more, uvalu i okolne otoke. Ova vila predstavlja idealan izbor za obiteljski odmor, ali i izvrsnu investicijsku priliku za turistički najam. Više informacija, fotografije i video materijal dostavljamo na upit, uz potpisani ugovor o posredovanju. - prodaja agencije #adriaINgroup - kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju 3% + PDV od prodajne cijene Cijenjeni klijenti, razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani posrednički ugovor koji je temelj za daljnje radnje vezane za kupoprodaju, a sve sukladno Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. ENG ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- For sale is a beautiful Mediterranean villa located in a quiet area of Ljubljeva Bay, Vinišće, only two hundred meters from the sea. The villa offers complete privacy and peace, thanks to its position in a dead-end street, and enchants with a panoramic view of the sea and nearby islands. It is surrounded by rich, well-maintained Mediterranean vegetation that further emphasizes the authentic Dalmatian ambiance. Basic characteristics: • Land area: 615 m² • Living area: 254 m² • Year of construction: around 2010 • Maintained and renovated - most of the furniture and equipment was installed a few years ago • Swimming pool: 24 m² • Private parking for 4 vehicles Layout: The villa consists of three floors: ground floor, middle floor and upper floor. • Ground floor: Three spacious bedrooms, two bathrooms, hallway and access to the terrace and 24 m² swimming pool. In the courtyard there is a well-kept garden with Mediterranean plants, olive trees and other indigenous cultures. • Middle floor: Spacious kitchen connected to the dining room and living room, additional bathroom and access to two smaller terraces (partially covered) with a beautiful sea view. • Upper floor: Spacious bedroom with open bathroom and living area, which can serve as a separate living unit. Access to a large covered terrace with impressive panoramic views of the sea, the bay and the surrounding islands. This villa is an ideal choice for a family vacation, but also an excellent investment opportunity for tourist rental. More information, photos and video material are provided upon request, with a signed brokerage contract. - sale of #adriaINgroup agency - the buyer pays an agency commission of 3% + VAT of the sales price Dear clients, viewing of the property is only possible with a signed mediation agreement, which is the basis for further actions related to the sale, and all in accordance with the Act on mediation in real estate transactions. #adriaINgroup real estate-consulting-design-development-VIP service ...............................................................
